Specimen Type: Skin scrapings, nail clippings, hair, sputum, bronchoalveolar lavage, blood, sterile body fluids, biopsy tissues
Purpose: Isolation, identification, and reporting of pathogenic fungi from clinical specimens
Equipment: Biosafety cabinet, sterile inoculation loops/needles, agar plates (e.g., Sabouraud Dextrose Agar, Mycosel, Birdseed, Chromogenic), incubator (25–35 °C), microscope with lactophenol cotton blue and KOH, culture identification system (e.g., MALDI-TOF MS)
